metadata.title: CVE-2022-4007 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from15.3 prior to 15.7.8, version 15.8 prior to 15.8.4, and version 15.9 priorto 15.9.2 A cross-site scripting vulnerability was found in the title fieldof work items that allowed attackers to perform arbitrary actions on behalfof victims at client side.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
